mapper.sql: CTTId, Year, Place, ClCode, ClName, Tax, TrTax, Rate
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_travelclasstaxcontribute where year=#{0} and place=#{1}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_travelclasstaxcontribute (CTTId, Year, Place, ClCode, ClName, Tax, TrTax, Rate) values (#{cttid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tax,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{trtax,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{rate,jdbcType=DOUBLE})

Year = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

ClCode = #{clcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ClName = #{clname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

Rate = #{rate,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where CTTId = #{cttid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
